content: Shop fresh, locally-grown foods at these Pittsburgh farmers markets

Find something fresh at aPittsburgh farmers market. Shop locally-grown produce, farm-fresh meat, prepared foods, craft beer, local wine and spirits, artisans and so much more at locations throughout the region.
Wednesdays, June 5 - Oct.Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: Bayne Park, 34 North Balph Avenue, Bellevue, PA
Tuesdays, May – Sept.Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: South Park VIP Parking Lots, directly off Corrigan Drive near the ice skating rink
Saturdays, May 4 – Nov.16Hours: 9 a.m. – 1 p.m.Location: 5050 Liberty Avenue
Wednesdays, Fridays (June-October) and Saturdays (April-Thanksgiving)Hours: 3:30-6 p.m. Wednesdays and Fridays, 9 a.m.-1 p.m. SaturdaysLocation: 1000 Braddock Avenue, Pittsburgh
Sundays, July 7 - Aug. 25, Sundays Sept. 8-22Hours: Noon-3 p.m.Location: East Main Street between Broadway and Mary Streets in Carnegie
Wednesdays, June 12-Nov. 20Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: Carrick Dairy District, 1529 Brownsville Road
Mondays, June 10- Nov. 25Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: Liberty Green Park, 100 Larimer Avenue
Fridays, May 24-Nov. 22Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: Allegheny Commons Park, East Ohio St. & Cedar Ave.
Sundays, May 12- Nov. 24Hours: 9 a.m. – 1 p.m.Location: Beacon/Bartlett parking lot, 5737 Beacon Street, Pittsburgh
Thursdays, May - Sept.Hours: 3-6 p.m.Location: The Block Northway, near DSW Shoe Warehouse in the South Atrium, Upper Level, 8013 McKnight Road, Pittsburgh
Every Saturday Year-roundHours: 5 a.m. to noonLocation: 344 Sheridan Avenue, Pittsburgh
Fridays, May - Oct.Hours: 4 - 7 p.m.Location: Forest Hills Westinghouse Lodge Parking Lot, 4400 Greensburg Pike, Forest Hills
Thursdays, May 16 - Oct. 24Hours: 4 - 7 p.m.Location: Green Tree Park, Lower Level, 905 Greentree Road, Pittsburgh
Wednesdays, June 5 - Oct. 9Hours: 3 - 7 p.m.Location: Hampton Twp. Community Park, 3101 McCully Road, Allison Park
Tuesdays, May 21 – Nov. 26Hours: 3 - 7 p.m.Location: Bay 41, 115 41st Street, Pittsburgh
Thursdays, May 16 – Oct. 31Hours: 10 a.m. - 2 p.m.Location: Market Square
Saturdays, May 13 - Nov. 18Hours: 9 a.m. - noonLocation: Monroeville Mall (Between Dick's and Best Buy)
Second and Fourth Wednesdays, June 12 - Sept. 25Hours: 5 - 9 p.m. (June-Aug) 5-8 p.m. (Sept.)Location: Moon Park
June 20, July 18, Aug. 29, Sept. 19Hours: 5:30 - 8 p.m.Location: Renzie Park, 500 Fifth Avenue, McKeesport
Mondays, May 13-Oct. 27Hours: 3-7 p.m.Location: Holy Trinity, 5718 Steubenville Pike, McKees Rocks
Wednesdays, May 15-Oct.Hours: 3 - 7 p.m.Location: St. John’s Evangelical Lutheran Church parking lot, 920 Perry Hwy.
Saturdays, April - last Saturday before ThanksgivingHours: 9 a.m. - 1 p.m.Location: St. James Parking Lot, 200 Walnut St., Sewickley, PA.
Thursdays, May-HalloweenHours: 2:30 – 6:30 p.m.Location: 7209 Thomas Blvd., intersection of Thomas Blvd. and Homewood Ave.
Saturdays, June 1 - Oct.Hours: 9 a.m. - 2 p.m.Location: Dickson Preparatory STEAM Academy, 7301 Schoyer Ave, Swissvale
Wednesdays, June 12 – Oct.Hours: 9 a.m. - 1 p.m.Location: Parking lot of the First United Presbyterian Church, 913 Lock Street, Tarentum
Thursdays, May - Sept.Hours: 4- 7 p.m.Location: Westminster Church parking lot, 2040 Washington Road, Upper St. Clair
